word: Never be ashamed of your faith; never be found on the side of the enemy. "Ye are the light of the world." Matthew 5:14. Your faith is to be revealed as precious truth, truth which all should have and all must have if they are saved.... We should fight the good fight of faith, and be found "stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord." 1 Corinthians 15:58.
